title: Don’t believe this morphed picture of PM Modi holding packets of ‘Bhabhi Ji Papad’ | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
Days after Union minister Arjun Ram Meghwal launched ‘Bhabhi Ji Papad’, a picture has surfaced on the internet in which Prime Minister Narendra Modi can be seen holding packets of ‘Bhabhi Ji Papad’.

The post also had a message bubble attributed to the Prime Minister with a message ‘Bhabhi Ji papad khao corona bhagao’ or have Bhabhi Ji papad and get rid of corona.

ALSO READ: These pictures of saffron painted buildings are not from…

NewsMobile fact checked the above picture and found it to be FAKE.

On putting the picture through Reverse Image Search, we found the original picture which actually features Arjun Ram Meghwal.

A report by AajTak featured the original picture in which we can see Meghwal holding two packets of ‘Bhabhi Ji Papad’.

In the above FAKE vs REAL collage, it is clear that Arjun Ram Meghwal’s face was replaced by PM Modi’s using photo editing software.

In conclusion, the above information proves that the post in question is FAKE.

If you want to fact-check any story, WhatsApp it now on +91 88268 00707
